basics.name: Senior Analyst
basics.label: Data Quality & Governance
basics.summary: Analyst versed in data analysis and reporting, user acceptance testing, as well as solving complex problems in high-pressure environments. Excels at cultivating, managing, and leveraging relationships

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Create policies and procedures for actuarial and analytics group. Monitor adherence to policies with scheduled reviews. Conduct training on quality and governance policies. Lead analyst for HIPAA compliance. Create and analyze validation reports for health plan data. Lead discussions regarding data issues identified

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Experience with process analysis and other analytic functions. Ability to interact effectively with different business units, team members, and external client at all levels. Generates eligibility, medical, and pharmacy claims data for each Health Ministry to support budgeting, rate development, and manage the reinsurance program.
highlights: Creates ad hoc data analyses and reports as needed

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for identifying processes to streamline and assist with various projects. Created and maintained access databases for departmental use.
highlights: Created reports for SEC and FINRA audits

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Created and maintained managerial reporting. Primary contact for electronic invoicing.
highlights: Created multiple databases for interdepartmental need

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for daily operations of 401(k) accounts for retirement services clients. Balanced 401(k) accounts regularly.
highlights: Researched and resolved out of balance situations quickly

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for managing incoming and outgoing account conversions.
highlights: Revised an existing Microsoft Access program for incoming assets for accuracy

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for re-registration of physical assets for trust customers.
highlights: Streamlined processes by automating applications for quicker processing and problem resolution
Created a Microsoft Access program to track pending registration issues and generate reports

volunteer.summary: Volunteer weekly in local elementary school in reading development. Lead business meetings on a weekly basis. Volunteer in children's church on a weekly basis
